ygData.subject: Pattern Association and Consolidation Emerges from Connectivity Properties between Cortex and Hippocampus
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, I would like to share with you my recent paper that deals with hippocampus-related functions that emerge from abstract connectivity properties
